title: TraderStat

content: ‚ú¥Ô∏èI present to your attention one of the huge list of traders that I analyzed using TradingView - TradingAxisüí†The trader has been in the community for 2 years, and it is noticeable that everything is very good with the technique of price movement. During this period of time, the trader managed to find more than 13,500 like-minded people among the subscribers. A trader with a reputation of more than 51,500 shares trading ideas for the forex market.We tested 268 trader's ideas in the 5 months, 80 profitable trades out of 268, which is approximately 30% accuracy. The total result for 268 ideas was 2755 pips.Brief statistics - https://imageup.ru/img11/thumb/index3965444.jpgAll statistics - https://traderstat.com/trader/TradingAxis‚ùóÔ∏èYou can find more verified providers on our page - TraderStat üå± Save your deposit from losses, verify your provider.üó£ Chat of our community - https://t.me/+TYzp-TCiz9U4YjEyüíª Website - http://TraderStat.com‚úàÔ∏è Our Telegram - @TraderStatistic#forex | #crypto | #stocks | #commodities | #indexes | #futures | #options | #signal | #trading | #trader | #moneymaker | #traderstat | #tradingaxis

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: I don't think you have shown enough proof on the trade and profit made. As usual is about paid group and maybe you decide to do real call with those who paid for subscription, I saw that below on the telegram and I understood correctly your intention as nothing is going for free.

As usual is about paid group and maybe you decide to do real call with those who paid for subscription, I saw that below on the telegram and I understood correctly your intention as nothing is going for free.it's always about scamming people via "trading signals"¬† I do hope newbies stay clear off this one. Nothing comes of easy. One has to learn how to carry out technical analysis and trade independently.

Our paid subscription gives you access to all the signal providers we have checked, from which you can choose the best one.

comments.author: Danydee72
comments.body: Quote from: TraderStat on July 28, 2022, 05:59:19 AMAs I described earlier, our company DOES NOT provide paid signals! We only check signal providers. Our paid subscription gives you access to all the signal providers we have checked, from which you can choose the best one.On your page, on the list of signal providers checked, one may see TraderStat as a signal provider too. How are we supposed to take that?

comments.author: TraderStat
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee72 on July 28, 2022, 08:42:55 AMQuote from: TraderStat on July 28, 2022, 05:59:19 AMAs I described earlier, our company DOES NOT provide paid signals! We only check signal providers. Our paid subscription gives you access to all the signal providers we have checked, from which you can choose the best one.On your page, on the list of signal providers checked, one may see TraderStat as a signal provider too. How are we supposed to take that?We are changing the policy of the company, focusing only on verification, new members are no longer accepted into the subscription signals, even already on the site you can not buy it anywhere. Now only subscriptions by verified providers are available. Also our team publishes free market analysis in our TradingView profile.
